item.title: Handy macOS QuickLook setting
item.description: QuickLook is a nice feature or Mac OS/macOS that help to glance through different kinds of files in Finder without open any particular apps or editors. This feature is very handy when you only want to check on a certain file or quickly examine its parts instead of opening full-blown apps for that particular file.
